alert.note: Alert for West Slopes South Central Cascades and Passes (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued May 27 at 2:53AM PDT until May 29 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM SATURDAY TO 5 PM PDT SUNDAY ABOVE 4500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 4500 feet. Total snow accumulations of up to 6 inches. * WHERE...Cascade mountains of Pierce and Lewis Counties, including the Crystal Mountain Ski Area and Paradise on Mount Rainier. * WHEN...From 1 PM Saturday to 5 PM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow at the extreme high elevations of Mount Rainier is expected to begin Saturday afternoon, snow levels will be dropping throughout the day.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions in Washington state, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: West Slopes South Central Cascades and Passes
